info: 中央车站-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本3

content: Huh? Hit the brakes! I haven't explained what you can do in Metropolis, have I?
info: 中央车站-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本3

content:
But it's just a teeny-tiny bit different from your usual fun~
Metropolis is the biggest commercial district in all of Skyriver,
and Neighbors from every Astralink love to shop and hang out there!
info: 中央车站-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本3
中央车站-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本3

content:
You can also contact your friends through <color=#8AAB4B>"Yoohoo Friends"</color>
to go together~!
Just wait until I confirm the Astralink with Metropolis, it'll be super quick!
info: 中央车站-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本3

content: Your introduction is all about "having fun"...
info: 中央车站-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本3

content:
That's... {短暂停}absolutely perfect!
I just got in touch with Station Master <color=#8AAB4B>Rhine</color> from
<color=#8AAB4B>Metropolis</color> Central Station.
info: 中央车站-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本3

content:
How did you know that?!
That's right, let's go have fun!
info: 中央车站-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本3

content:
Of course we're gonna...{短暂停}
have fun!

content:

You finished all that Astralink work,
and you're still so energetic without taking a break?
